#summary Build Bamboo and VIC for Linux platform

= Introduction =

Build Bamboo DHT

= Details =

Steps: 
1) Copy Bamboo src to the destination folder, for example, /usr/local/
2) Change the owners of the source code to your accountID, for example; 
chown -R yourname:yourname BambooDHT
3) Build the BambooDHT by executing the command: make
4) Build the document of BambooDHT by executing make inside doc directory: 
cd doc/
make
5) Build the java document by executing make inside doc/javadocs directory:
cd doc/javadocs/
make
